definition: Sony (former name of the company used prior to 2009 in some markets including Taiwan, Hong Kong and Singapore, now replaced by 索尼[Suo3 ni2] in all markets)
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: It has to consume more and become more innovative and productive.
sentences.chinese: 中国必须增加消费，必须更具创新力和生产力。

sentences.english: Xin Li hopes the pure-hearted cooperation and go ahead hand by hand with you.
sentences.chinese: 期待我们的真诚合作，新力与你携手迸进。

sentences.english: Getting around these retailing hurdles will require flexibility and creativity.
sentences.chinese: 解决这些问题需要灵活性和创新力。

sentences.english: Stellar Mega Media is a highly innovative and globalized enterprise in the field of cultural media.
sentences.chinese: 星美传媒是一家极具创新力和国际化的文化传媒企业。

sentences.english: In fact, women are the fastest-growing segment of America's "adventure travel" industry.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，女性现已成为美国“探险旅行”的新力军。

sentences.english: Our relationship with Sony is one where we develop autonomously.
sentences.chinese: 我们和新力的关系没有影响我们自主开发游戏。

definition: to arrive/to reach (esp. perfection)/utmost/(used in commercials)
see 泰和縣|泰和县[Tai4 he2 xian4]
Chiuju township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
(to escape danger etc) by a hair's breadth (idiom)/in a critical state/on the brink of crisis/very close (to happening)/Taiwan pr. [jian4 bu4 rong2 fa3]
